name: 林裕森
objective:
本課程將介紹國內外的住宅建設生命周期各階段的介紹。
該課程將在以下主題中進行。
A. 建築開發流程
B. 規劃審查施工生產的總體方向，包括施工合同，項目預算，生命週期，
  風險管理和資金分配方法。
C. 設計物流和裝貨的程度，施工方法。 設計系統，建築設計智能，建築材
  料和性能。 建築生產對社會的影響。
D. 施工現場調查，施工計劃，施工前時間表，施工管理，方法及其演變。
E. 裝修建築拆除或裝修的評估標準，裝修計劃，設計，項目，法令和系統。
F. 拆除：建築拆除的機械和方法，以及建築廢料的再利用。 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This course will introduce the domestic and foreign housing production system and renovation technology cases.
The course will be conducted in the following topics.
A.  Real estate development
B.	Planning A review of the overall direction of construction production, including construction contract, project budget,life cycle, risk management and method of fund dispatch.
C.	Design The degree of logistics and loading, construction method. Design system, building design intelligence,building materials and performance. The influence of construction production to society.
D.	Construction The site investigation, construction plan, time schedule before construction, construction management,methods and their evolutions.
E.	Renovation The assessment criteria of building demolition or renovation, the renovation plan, design, project, decree and system.
F.	Demolition：The building demolition machinery and methods, and the reuse of building waste materials.
